amendment.description: To extend the authorization of appropriations for the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2592 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2592 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S13057; text: CR S13057) To extend the authorization of appropriations for the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2592 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2592 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Domenici.
